title: tannai bhajikkalAgAdA
sahitya:
tannai bhajikkalAgAdA dayai nidhiyAm kapAli


anupallavi

  annai tandai pOlum aruL shurandANDavan
 cennai tirumayilai tannil vaLar kapAli


caraNam    avanaruL inri Or aNuvum ashaiyAdenum AnrOr mozhi uNarndum arivizhandAi andO
shivanaip-pADattanda nAvinAl kallai muLLai shiru matiyAl kAkkai kuruviyaip- pADuginrAi deivam uNDenum vivEkam idanru nanri konra shiva dUSaNai anrO
uyvazhi inRi bhava shuzhalil shikki uzhalAdE rAmadAsan tozhum deivam
